fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.store.javamail

Class JMStoreMessage

  • Object
    • fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.core.StoreElement
      • fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.core.StoreMessage
        • fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.store.javamail.JMStoreMessage

  • public class JMStoreMessage
extends StoreMessage
    StoreMessage sub-class for mail boxes extracted through JavaMail library.

    For now, IMAP and Thunderbird mbox, eml structure through MailExtract application, could also be used for POP3 and Gmail, via StoreExtractor (not tested).

    • Field Summary
